meanings.sent1: The pated man wore a hat to protect his head from the sun.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the pated patient's skull for any injuries.
meanings.sent3: The pated professor always kept his mind sharp along with his head.
meanings.sent4: The pated mountain stood tall against the clear blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The pated statue's head gleamed in the sunlight, attracting many visitors.

meanings.sent1: The pated grandfather always joked about his lack of hair.
meanings.sent2: The pated actor shined under the bright lights of the stage.
meanings.sent3: The pated comedian made fun of his own baldness in his stand-up routine.
meanings.sent4: The pated moon in the night sky seemed to glow with its own light.
meanings.sent5: The pated eagle soared gracefully, its bald head catching the sunlight.
